users.bio: Computer Science student passionate about web development and AI. Love building things that make a difference!
Software engineering enthusiast with a focus on mobile app development and UI/UX design.
Full-stack developer and Google Cloud enthusiast. Always excited to learn new technologies!
Machine Learning researcher and data science advocate. Building the future with AI.
DevOps engineer passionate about cloud infrastructure and automation.

events.title: Introduction to Google Cloud Platform
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of Google Cloud Platform including Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and Cloud Functions. Perfect for beginners!

events.title: Android Development Workshop
events.description: Build your first Android app using Kotlin and Android Studio. We'll cover UI design, data handling, and publishing to Play Store.

events.title: Machine Learning with TensorFlow
events.description: Dive into machine learning using TensorFlow. We'll build and train neural networks for image classification.

positions.name: Web Development Lead
positions.description: Lead our web development initiatives and mentor junior developers. Help organize workshops and manage our website.

questions.label: What's your experience with web development?
Describe a web project you're proud of

positions.name: Event Coordinator
positions.description: Help organize and coordinate GDG events. Perfect for someone who loves event planning and community building.

questions.label: Why do you want to help organize events?
Do you have any event planning experience?

positions.name: Social Media Manager
positions.description: Manage our social media presence and create engaging content for our community.

questions.label: What social media platforms are you most familiar with?
Which content types can you create?

projects.title: GDG Website Redesign
projects.description: Complete redesign of the GDG UTSC website using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features include event management, user profiles, and project showcases.

projects.title: Event Check-in App
projects.description: Mobile app for checking in attendees at GDG events. Built with Flutter and Firebase for real-time updates.

projects.title: AI Study Helper
projects.description: Machine learning project that helps students organize study materials and generate quiz questions from lecture notes.

questions.What's your experience with web developm: I have 2 years of experience with React and modern web development. Built several personal projects including an e-commerce site.
questions.Describe a web project you're proud of: My portfolio website built with Next.js and deployed on Vercel. Features smooth animations and responsive design.

questions.What's your experience with web developm: Full-stack developer with 3 years experience. Comfortable with both frontend and backend technologies.
questions.Describe a web project you're proud of: Built a real-time chat application using React, Node.js, and Socket.io for my final year project.
